title: [FIXED] Summoner Name not Available..?
body: I've tried everything. From some standard names like "Cícerò" (my favorite Latin author), to "fd7dasaj28a", but not a single name is available. Everytime I try to create the name it just tells me it's unavailable. There aren't any people at all with the names I write into the box, not even in other regions. What is going on?

replies.body: Fixed. I simply relogged, restarted the client and it somehow worked ._.
Ayyyyy sometimes a good old fashioned "turn it off and on again" can still do the trick eh?
